name: Invasion of the Squares from the Fifth Dimension
name_original: Invasion of the Squares from the Fifth Dimension
description:
It seems Plan 9 wasn't the final plan from outer space...

"Invasion of the Squares from the Fifth Dimension" is a simple, old-fashioned arcadey top-down shooter. You play as Earth's only hope against the alien menace that has poured into a B-movie universe from another dimension. Yeah, you're that guy. Hope you're up for the job.
